title: LOWER CHALET

headings.text: ABOUT US            CONTACT US           searcH        Media

paragraphs: The lower chalet was built around the time of the mountain road (mid to late 1930s). It exists intact today. Opposite the chalet is a flat viewing area which previously had seating installed overlooking the spectacular view.
In 2018 the Parkâ€™s trustees agreed to make the chalet (WPHH0040) a priority place for nomination to the Tasmanian Historic Register.
